title: Daydream
description: Daydream, or was it more like a Nightmare?  He was a biker, a Nomad at that. They're the worst type of outlaws to fall for. He called me his daydream and I fell.  I promised I wouldn't f√óck him, but I lied and then left. I had to, he didn't want kids and I was carrying his child.  Now, I have to go back and can't help but wonder... will he kill me for keeping his son a secret?  Complete standalone, Oath Keepers MC Nomads, HEA, No Cheating
author: Sapphire Knight
